Tips for Your Request

  • Provide Complete Information: The more details you provide, the faster donors can match.
  • Update Your Location: Helps nearby donors find you quickly.
  • Check Status Regularly: Visit your request details to see matching progress.
  • Contact Hospital: If urgent, reach out to your hospital directly.

AB+

âšª

"Universal recipient! Can receive from anyone."

Can receive from:

All types

Know Your Type: If you have AB+ blood type, you're a universal recipient and can receive blood from any donor - a huge advantage! Check your blood type if you don't know it yet.
